doc:
Frank Marlowe https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Marlowe 0 Frank Marlowe, also known as Frank Riggi and Frank Marlo (January 20, 1904 – March 30, 1964) was an American character actor from the 1930s until the 1960s. During Marlowe's 30-year career he would appear in over 200 feature films, as well as dozens of television shows. Frank_Marlowe , also_known as Frank_Riggi and Frank_Marlo ( January_20_,_1904 – March_30_,_1964 ) was an_American_character_actor from the_1930s until the_1960s . During Marlowe 's_30-year_career he would_appear in over_200_feature_films , as_well_as dozens of television_shows .
